title: Liverpool fans are panicking after influential midfielder Adam Lallana is ruled out for a month with thigh injury
text:
Sport Liverpool fans are panicking after influential midfielder Adam Lallana is ruled out for a month with thigh injury Lallana was injured playing for England and Reds fans are not happy he will now miss the Merseyside derby Share Adam Lallana was injured playing for England (Photo: Laurence Griffiths) Share Get daily updates directly to your inbox + Subscribe 
Adam Lallana has been fantastic for Liverpool this season. 
From midfield he has found the back of the net seven times and has created seven goals as the Reds battle for a top-four finish. 
So when he picked up a thigh injury while representing England in a 2-0 win over Lithuania, Liverpool fans were not best pleased. 
The former Saints man is not due to return to Jurgen Klopp's side until the end of April, meaning he will miss a number of crucial fixtures. Jurgen Klopp will be without the midfielder for a month (Photo: Getty) 
As well as the Merseyside derby at the weekend, Lallana will be out against Bournemouth, Stoke, West Brom and Crystal Palace. 
So what can you do in a situation like this, knowing one of your key men is virtually out for the rest of the season at the business end of it? 
Well, you could stay calm and look at the positives. 
Brazilian stars Roberto Firmino and Phlippe Coutinho are on their way back from south America for the Merseyside derby. Lallana will miss a number of crucial fixtures (Photo: Andrew Powell) Video Loading Click to play Tap to play The video will start in 8 Cancel Play now
